DataElement.preferredName: Investigational Study Disease Term Accession Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Identification number of a term selected from an ontology or a controlled vocabulary for investigation disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: In the process of being studied; experimental.  (NCI)_A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it; the activities undertaken during a study._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Identified; having the identity known or established.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: In the process of being studied; experimental.  (NCI):A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it; the activities undertaken during a study.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. Concepts.definition: In the process of being studied; experimental.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Identified; having the identity known or established.

Concepts.definition: The procedure of having an identity established.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: An action taken in pursuit of an objective; the state of being active.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A word or expression used for some particular thing._A control number unique to an object, used to identify it among the other objects in a collection._Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: The distinguishing qualities or prominent aspect of a person, object, action, process, or substance.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A word or expression used for some particular thing.:A control number unique to an object, used to identify it among the other objects in a collection.:Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A word or expression used for some particular thing.
A control number unique to an object.  It is used to identify the object among other objects in a collection.
A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
